title: New Zealand Weekly Review. No. 435. Theatre...beginners please
creator_credit: Frank Ponton, Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Surveys the theatre in New Zealand from the day of “Wonderful Acetylene Gas Lighting Effects” to the amateur theatrical and play reading groups, and the touring Companies of to-day.
